about_the_game:
Explore a procedurally generated island paradise
After your ship sank in a disastrous storm, you find yourself stranded on a series of islands. You not only have to find your crew-mates, but explore the environment to find the resources to make it to the next islands until you find a new ship and a way home. Thanks to the procedural map generation every playthrough delivers new challenges and adventures.

Build a camp to survive
Utilize the natural resources to build and maintain a camp. And whatever you do, do not forget to drink a lot of water!

Utilize your mates’ abilities
Enhance and leverage the abilities of your crew. Seamlessly transition between all available characters and make sure to use them to your advantage.

Enjoy the scenery
Yes, survival is paramount. But who says, there isn’t enough time to soak up the sun and enjoy the Caribbean? With beautiful animations and vibrant islands you are tempted to stay and relax.

A trusty sidekick
What is a skipper without a parrot on his shoulder? That’s right: hardly more than a landlubber. Never shy of a remark, your feathered friend makes sure, you will survive this island. And the next. And the one after that…

Easy controls
If you use your trusty combo of keyboard and mouse or rely on a gamepad: You are in absolute and easy-to-learn control of this extraordinary island puzzle adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i5-series Quadcore, AMD Ryzen-series
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i7-series Quadcore, AMD Ryzen-series
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080, AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Ahoy, mateys! We are marooned on a series of islands and need to find a way home. Help us explore the environment, build camps and find glorious booty. Join us on an island hopping adventure full of parrot wisdom, pirate mayhem and puzzle glory! Arrr!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
